name: Breaking the Eternal Curse
description: A terrible curse has been cast upon the land,
twisting reality and corrupting all it touches.
Only one with true courage can break its hold.

dialogs.start1: The curse spreads like a plague across the land.
dialogs.start2: Many have tried to break it, all have failed.
dialogs.start3: Do you truly believe you can succeed where others could not?
dialogs.progress1: The curse fights back against your efforts...
dialogs.progress2: You're getting closer to its source.
dialogs.progress3: The very air trembles as the curse weakens!
dialogs.complete1: The eternal curse has been broken!
dialogs.complete2: The land is free once more. You have done the impossible!
